title: Bug 116564: The title of hyperlink builder should be "Hyperlink Options", now it changes with settings.
OB: The title of the hyperlink builder is changing to "www.actuate.com" after clicking on "OK" and reopening the hyperlink builder.
EB: The title of the hyperlink builder should remain as "Hyperlink Options" even after clicking on "OK" and reopening the hyperlink builder.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Set a label hyperlink as "www.actuate.com". 2. Click on "OK". 3. Reopen the hyperlink builder.
